intro.name: Sheik Faridh
intro.short_description: I like bringing ideas to life with web technologies
intro.description: I'm a software engineer specializing in building the software that makes the difference in the people's lives. Working with my hands to make some magic happen on the internet. I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

roles: Designed and developed the application with the new technologies
Collaborated with the mentor to develop an application for internal organization purpose
Research and execute the new concepts in the development
Designed the application with responsive design
Woked with a team of ten members to build a different file editors interface using React
Refactored the React application from class component to functional component
Developed an application to replace the paid library with an open source library
Undertake the broad research by assessing the feasiblity of developments
Developed frontend and serverless application for Freshworks marketplace platform
Designed and developed the custom web application for Freshworks customers
Integrate third party application with the Freshworks product
Coordinate with the backend team for API integration in client side
